title: Add Copy Raw button to AI console for full output including base64
description: Add a second "Copy Raw" button to the AI console that copies all raw output including base64 encoded data. Keep the existing formatted copy button for readable output. Users can choose which version they want.

title: Add Copy Raw button with full unformatted output to AIProgressPanel
AI Thinking Overlay - Show intermediate images with pulsing effect during iterations
description: When the AI is in reference mode and iterating through candidate images, show each intermediate result as a semi-transparent pulsing overlay on the canvas. This gives users visual feedback that the AI is "thinking" and lets them see the spatial alignment of generated content. The pulsing animation makes it unmistakably "work in progress".

title: Add thinking image state to AIProgressContext
Create ThinkingOverlay component with pulsing animation
Integrate ThinkingOverlay into canvas and wire up iteration images
Fix ThinkingOverlay bugs and add Apple Intelligence-style gradient border
description: Fix issues with the ThinkingOverlay: 1) Border never pulsed, 2) "AI Thinking" label stayed after completion. Replace with Apple Intelligence-style animated rainbow/prismatic gradient border that rotates around the canvas edge.

title: Fix ThinkingOverlay - replace with Apple Intelligence gradient border animation
Fix ThinkingOverlay - remove white background, fix status clearing
description: Issues: 1) White rectangle covering canvas - the ::before pseudo-element has background: #fafafa blocking the view. Should be transparent. 2) Border stayed glowing after completion - thinkingStatus not clearing when AI process ends. 3) Glow scope wrong - should start on command execution and end when ENTIRE process completes, not per-iteration.

title: Add interim image overlay and shimmer particles to ThinkingOverlay
description: 1) Restore semi-transparent interim images showing on top of canvas during AI iterations. 2) Add subtle animated shimmer/sparkle particles floating across the canvas surface for magical effect.

title: Fix ThinkingOverlay positioning and add debug logging
description: The ThinkingOverlay (image and particles) aren't showing. Issues: 1) The container div needs position:relative for absolute children to work. 2) Need debug logging to verify thinkingStatus and thinkingImage are being set.

title: Create Express server foundation with TypeScript and shared types
Implement core AI proxy endpoint with Gemini SDK
Add image generation and inpainting endpoints
Add SSE streaming endpoint for agentic operations
Create integration tests for API contract
Create client API adapter layer
Wire client services to use API adapter
Fix SSE client to use POST instead of query params for large payloads
description: HTTP 431 error occurs when calling /api/ai/agentic/edit because base64 images are sent in URL query params. Need to use fetch() with POST body and streaming instead of EventSource which only supports GET.

title: Fix SSE client to handle comments and empty data events
description: SSE client throws "Failed to parse SSE event data" because it tries to JSON.parse empty strings. Server sends `: SSE stream initialized` comment which has no data field. Client should skip comments and events without data.

title: Replace custom SSE client with @microsoft/fetch-event-source
Add zod validation to server routes
Replace fetch wrappers with ky in client
Fix ky prefixUrl path handling - remove leading slashes from endpoints
description: ky ignores prefixUrl when the path starts with /. API_ENDPOINTS have leading slashes which breaks the calls. Either remove leading / from API_ENDPOINTS in apiConfig.ts OR strip them in apiClient.ts before calling ky.

title: Implement incremental thinkingTextDelta for SSE streaming
description: Fix SSE text overwriting by switching from full text replacement to incremental deltas. Server sends thinkingTextDelta with new chars only, client appends to existing text.

title: Update AIProgressEvent types (server + client)
Update server agenticService to send incremental deltas
Update AIProgressContext to handle thinkingTextDelta
Add POLYGON enum and toolbar button
Add streaming to self-check phase in agenticService
description: Change selfCheck function to use gemini.callStream() instead of gemini.call() so thinking text streams during self-check phase. Need to track previousThinkingLength separately for the self-check phase.

title: Polygon Selection Tool for AI Manipulation Mode
description: Add click-to-add-vertices polygon selection tool to generative fill. Users click to place vertices, double-click or click near start to close. Complements existing brush/rectangle/lasso tools.

title: Implement polygon event handlers in DrawingLayer
Render polygon selection in SelectionOverlay
Integrate polygon with mask generation and completion flow
Add editable interpretation UI to MoveConfirmationDialog
Inline Editable Interpretation in MoveConfirmationDialog
description: Replace the readonly interpretation text with an editable textarea that allows users to modify the AI's interpretation and replan without leaving the confirmation dialog

title: Wire up replan handler in App.tsx
Add full prompt/response transparency to SSE progress events
description: Send all prompts, inputs, thinking text, and raw AI responses through SSE progress events so the UI can display full transparency of what's happening.

title: Add prompt/rawOutput fields to AIProgressEvent types
Update agenticService to send prompts and raw responses
Update AIProgressContext and AILogEntry to store new fields
Polygon Tool for AI Reference/Manipulation Mode
description: Add click-to-add-vertices polygon markup tool to AI Reference mode. Users click to place vertices, double-click or click near start to close. Polygon gets sent to AI as part of manipulation context.

title: Add POLYGON to AIReferenceSubTool enum and toolbar
Implement polygon markup handlers and preview rendering in DrawingLayer
Update AIProgressPanel to display prompt and rawOutput fields
description: The LogEntryComponent in AIProgressPanel.tsx only renders thinkingText. Need to also render prompt and rawOutput fields so users can see the full transparency data.

title: Add onProgress callback to geminiService for lowest-level logging
description: Add callback mechanism to geminiService so every API call (call and callStream) can emit progress events with full request/response data. This ensures we capture everything at the absolute lowest level.

title: Wire agenticService to use geminiService onProgress callback
description: Update agenticService to pass onProgress callbacks to all gemini calls, forwarding the events through SSE to the client.

title: Add newLogEntry flag to force new log entries for each API call
description: Add newLogEntry?: boolean to AIProgressEvent. When true, client creates a new log entry instead of updating existing. Server sends this at the start of each distinct API call (planning, each self-check iteration).

title: Fix AI Reference polygon tool rendering bugs
description: Fix two bugs in polygon markup tool: (1) missing closing segment back to first point, (2) curved lines instead of straight edges

title: Fix polygon closing segment and remove curve rendering
Extract AI services to Express backend (Phase 1)
description: Move client-side Gemini API calls to an Express + TypeScript backend. Create proxy endpoints that hide API keys while maintaining the same functionality. Structure API for future Python/LangGraph replacement. Keep Google OAuth client-side.

title: Replace custom implementations with standard libraries
description: Refactor to use battle-tested npm libraries instead of custom implementations: @microsoft/fetch-event-source for SSE, zod for validation, ky for HTTP client.

title: Complete server-side AI migration (Phases 2-3.5)
description: Finish migrating all AI calls to server-side, remove client-side Gemini dependency, and deploy to Vercel with proper security.

Phase 3: Remove client-side Gemini code entirely

title: Tests, shared AI interaction export, remove AI Move
description: 1) Write tests for new ai_logging.py and inpaint mask fix, 2) Refactor AI interaction zip export into shared service usable by both AI Manipulation and AI Fill/Mask UIs, 3) Remove AI Move from UI

title: Unify AI Fill/Mask to use SSE streaming like AI Manipulation
description: Fix broken log display in AI Fill/Mask by migrating to SSE streaming through Express (like AI Manipulation). Share as much SSE infrastructure as possible between the two flows. Also add mask image display to log.

title: Fix SSE inpaint: show inputs immediately, fix step progression
description:
Two bugs in the new SSE inpaint streaming:
1. Inputs (source image, mask, prompt) not shown immediately when operation starts - should appear right away
2. Step text "Analyzing masked area" repeating/stuck instead of progressing to "Generating edit"

Need to:
1. Send sourceImage, maskImage, prompt in the FIRST progress event
2. Ensure newLogEntry creates distinct entries for each step
3. Make sure the complete event includes the final result properly

title: Fix: Analyzing appears twice, Python logs base64 images
description:
1. "Analyzing masked area" still appears twice before "Generating edit"
2. Python server logs full base64 image data - should only log metadata (size, dimensions, mime type)
3. Source/mask images not displaying in AI console log UI - they should be visible

title: Fix Python inpaint: imageData returns bytes repr instead of base64
description:
The Python inpaint endpoint returns malformed imageData:
`data:image/jpeg;base64,b'\xff\xd8\xff\xe0...`

The `b'...'` is Python's bytes representation being stringified instead of actual base64.

Root cause: likely in extract_image_from_response() - it's converting bytes to string incorrectly.

Fix: Ensure the bytes are properly base64 encoded, not just str(bytes).

title: Full Code Review for Checkin - SSE Streaming & Agentic Workflow
description: Comprehensive code review of 47 files across Python server, Express server, and React frontend. Review TypeScript like Hjelsberg (strict types, clean patterns), Python like Guido (pythonic, readable). Identify reusable code, improve tests, remove dead code, ensure type safety.

title: Review Python Server Core (main.py, graphs, schemas)

title: Remove deprecated sourceImage/maskImage fields from AIProgressEvent
description: Tech debt from code review: sourceImage and maskImage are marked @deprecated in favor of inputImages array. After client migration is complete, remove these deprecated fields.

title: Fix: Restart Express server to pick up inpaint-stream route
description: User reported 404 on /api/ai/inpaint-stream. The route is correctly defined in server/src/routes/ai.ts:107 and tests pass. Issue is likely that the running Express server needs to be restarted to pick up changes. Added route availability tests to verify route registration.

title: Phase 4: Python/LangGraph backend for AI workflows
description: Gradually migrate AI workflows from Express to Python/LangGraph, starting with a simple proxy to verify the setup works, then moving the agentic image manipulation workflow.

title: Migrate Express endpoints to Python with shadow testing
description:
Migrate all Express server endpoints to Python/FastAPI using shadow testing pattern. Both servers will receive requests in parallel, responses compared, and traffic gradually shifted to Python once validated. 

Strategy:
1. Create shadow testing middleware to dual-call both servers
2. Migrate endpoints in order of complexity (simple  complex)
3. Add comprehensive Python tests for each endpoint
4. Validate via shadow comparison before switching traffic

Endpoints to migrate:
- GET /health (simple)
- GET / (simple)  
- POST /api/ai/generate (medium)
- POST /api/images/generate (medium)
- POST /api/images/inpaint (medium-high)
- POST /api/ai/agentic/edit (complex - already done, needs shadow validation)

title: Migrate Express backend to Python/FastAPI and delete Express codebase
description: Complete migration from Express (port 3001) to Python/FastAPI (port 8001). Add missing endpoints to Python, update frontend API configuration, validate all endpoints, then remove Express server/ directory entirely.
